title: League report system not working as intended
body:
I just received a permanent ban, which is fine and good, speaking for itself, I technically _**do**_ deserve the punishment I have been given.
But the thing is, I don't think the system looks at both sides of the story. While people can sit there, egg you on to the point that you actually start tilting and cause you to lose your shit. Where's the justice in that? Where's the justice in the dude running down mid to the point where you tell him to "fuck off" and get banned just from them two words?

Riot don't care. Because they know that said banned user, is going to make another account, spend more money and do the exact same thing.

replies.body: If an actual Riot employee could comment on this and shed some light, that'd be very much appreciated.
